snippet: Google updated its Wallet mobile payment app for using cellphones to pay at stores, so people can link any credit card to it. But the app still works with only six Sprint and Virgin Mobile phones, which is just one of the challenges that Google and...
abstract: Google updated its Wallet mobile payment app for using cellphones to pay at stores, so people can link any credit card to it. But the app still works with only six Sprint and Virgin Mobile phones, which is just one of the challenges that Google and other mobile payment services face.

headline.main: Google Wallet Now Works With Multiple Credit Cards
